SELECT idx ,title ,content ,orifilename ,assetfilename,assetfilepath ,assetfilesize ,transcodingendtime ,transcodingstarttime ,transcodingstatus ,catalogendtime ,catalogstarttime ,catalogstatus ,createtime ,createuser ,mediainfo ,genre ,delflag FROM VTTM_VIDEO_TB WHERE IDX BETWEEN #{startIdx} AND #{endIdx} ORDER BY idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into vttm_rep_img_tb select (select max(represent_img_idx) from vttm_rep_img_tb) + row_number() over() as represent_img_idx ,row_number() over(partition by a.represent_img_seq ) as represent_img_seq ,trim(both '.jpg' from a.image) as image_file_id ,'{}' as represent_img_json ,now() as registed_time ,a.idx as video_idx ,'http://10.10.18.231:7070/darc4/proxyshot/'||b.assetfilepath|| trim(both '.jpg' from b.assetfilename) || '/' ||a.image as img_url ,trim(both '.jpg' from b.assetfilename) as section_idx ,a.shotid as shot_id from (select x.* ,json_array_elements(x.vtt_meta_json) ->>'period_num' as represent_img_seq ,json_array_elements(x.vtt_meta_json) ->>'image' as image from vttm_meta_info_tb x)a inner join VTTM_SHOT_TB b on a.idx = b.videoid and a.shotid = b.shotid where a.idx = #{idx} order by a.idx,a.shotid
mapper.select: select row_number() over () as img_idx , a.idx as video_idx , trim(both '.jpg' from a.image) as section_idx , trim(both '.jpg' from b.assetfilename) as image_file_id , b.assetfilepath || '/' || b.assetfilename as img_url from (select x.* , json_array_elements(json_build_array(x.vtt_meta_json)) ->> 'image_id' as image from vttm_meta_info_tb x) a inner join vttm_frame_img_tb b on a.idx = b.videoid and a.shotid = b.shotid and a.frameimgid = b.frameimgid where a.idx = #{idx} and a.idx >= 1073 and a.vtt_meta_json is not null and a.userid != 'konan' order by section_idx, a.idx,a.shotid

select a.infoType AS info_type ,a.user_id AS user_id from ( select distinct userid as user_id ,'visual' as infoType from vttm_meta_info_tb where idx = #{idx} union select distinct a.userid as user_id ,'sound' as infoType from vttm_sound_tb a join vttm_code_tb b on a.soundtype = b.code where videoid = #{idx} union select userid as user_id ,'section' as infoType from ( select distinct b.userid from (select * from vttm_section_info_tb where videoid = #{idx}) a join (select * from vttm_section_relation_tb where videoid = #{idx}) b on a.sectionid = b.subject_sectionid join vttm_code_tb c on b.relationcode = c.code union select distinct b.userid from (select * from vttm_section_info_tb where videoid = #{idx}) a join vttm_section_depiction_tb b on a.sectionid = b.sectionid union select distinct b.userid from (select * from vttm_section_info_tb where videoid = #{idx}) a join vttm_section_qa_tb b on a.sectionid = b.sectionid ) b union select userid as user_id ,'subtitle' as infoType from vttm_subtitle_tb where videoid = #{idx} ) a where a.user_id is not null and a.user_id != 'konan'
